unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up 'cause the Indian automotive scene is HOT with new vehicle launches!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up 'cause the Indian automotive scene is hot with new vehicle launches!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra is rumored to be dropping a new Scorpio variant just in time for Diwali. Sources say itâ€™s packing more power and even better mileage - perfect for those long drives back home to the family! Price is expected to be around Rs. 18 Lakh.
normalised: First up, Mahindra is rumored to be dropping a new Scorpio variant just in time for Diwali. Sources say it's packing more power and even better mileage - perfect for those long drives back home to the family! Price is expected to be around rupee eighteen lakh.

unnormalised: Then there's Tata Motors, who just unveiled the "Nexon Thunder," a souped-up version of their popular subcompact SUV. Think brighter colours, sportier interiors, and a banging sound system. Dr. Sharma, head of design, claims it's inspired by Mumbai's vibrant street culture.
normalised: Then there's T A T A Motors, who just unveiled the "Nexon Thunder," a souped-up version of their popular subcompact S U V. Think brighter colours, sportier interiors, and a banging sound system. Doctor Sharma, head of design, claims it's inspired by Mumbai's vibrant street culture.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki is teasing a glimpse of their new Alto 800 successor. They're promising a fuel-efficient engine and a surprisingly spacious cabin, despite its small size. We're talking practical and pocket-friendly here, folks!
normalised: Meanwhile, Maruti Suzuki is teasing a glimpse of their new Alto eight hundred successor. They're promising a fuel-efficient engine and a surprisingly spacious cabin, despite its small size. We're talking practical and pocket-friendly here, folks!

unnormalised: Plus, the new electric two-wheeler startup "Vayu Motors" just announced their first scooter, boasting a range of 150 km on a single charge. They're setting up shop in Chennai, with a brand new manufacturing plant spanning 50,000 sq ft. So much for Petrol prices, eh? The launch will be held in December. Keep an eye out for these bad boys!
normalised: Plus, the new electric two-wheeler startup "Vayu Motors" just announced their first scooter, boasting a range of one hundred and fifty kilometer on a single charge. They're setting up shop in Chennai, with a brand new manufacturing plant spanning fifty thousand square feet. So much for Petrol prices, eh? The launch will be held in December. Keep an eye out for these bad boys!
